name: Pixel Battle Royal Shooter Pro
description:
Pixel Battle Royal can be played in the first-player or third-player camera views to ensure everyone enjoys playing. Enjoy a pixel-block battle royal with lots of enemies. There's no place in this game for 2nd place. Only the last man standing will remain victorious. Will it be you?

Features:
- Battle royal, last man standing survival gameplay
- Lots of different guns to pick up and use
- Loads Armor & weapon perks
- Awesome 3D graphics
- 1st and 3rd person shooting
- 1 Simple map to learn
- No Ads!
